channel.title: Help! Disconnects when you die!
channel.description:
I have a really annoying problem with my server... I am using Winterlove, and when you have no health left (dead), the screen says loading please wait, but pauses. You have to close the client and restart it to respawn, and then it works fine... Why does it disconnect when you die? It says this on the compiler after you die:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21 at client.saveStats(client.java:2619) at client.packetProcess(client.java:6081) at client.packetSending(client.java:6069) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:121) at server.main(server.java:49) Testscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player Test3 ClientHandler: Test3 disconnected.
So whats the problem?

item.title: Help! Disconnects when you die!
item.dc:creator: @Hellbender10 Hellbender10
item.description:
@Hellbender10 wrote:

I have a really annoying problem with my server… I am using Winterlove, and when you have no health left (dead), the screen says loading please wait, but pauses. You have to close the client and restart it to respawn, and then it works fine… Why does it disconnect when you die? It says this on the compiler after you die:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21
at client.saveStats(client.java:2619)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:6081)
at client.packetSending(client.java:6069)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:121)
at server.main(server.java:49)
Testscape Server [fatal] - exception
Game saved for player Test3
ClientHandler: Test3 disconnected.

So whats the problem?

Read full topic
